I must say this is a nice CS game in  the franchise, oldough its a bit old. Graphics are nice for that era. Its verry differend than CS:GO. Better for sure, the way you cant realy shot trought walls. You play on servers you make or join some on the internet on the console. It doesnt have a competitive ranking sistem, no leveling up or somethig like that., it just has some records of you killing enemys damage done achivements kill to death racio (mine is 97.64) Would be nice if it had that Id play that. You have 48 maps total. My favourite one is "fy_simpsons_h_32". You can find your best but *wispers in pakistanish* this is the best one. You can always play on *SCREAMS IN GAY* de_nuke but its your opinion (invalid but still(there is no better map than fy_simpsons_h_32)). There are 4 Terrorists and 4 Counter Terrorists (no matter wich one you are you are shit fam(but you can try *moans in sexual way*fy_simpsons_h_32 mabie you will have more luck there cuz you know its the best map on CSS)). The granade graphics are ok just the flash and molotov are looking like a smoke... not a smoke a smoke smoke, a bum bum smoke but looks realistic for the most part for its time.The guns are OK when it comes to balance. but the dual *cough* *cough*.THE DUAL BRETTAS ARE JUST FUCKING PEW PEW *dead*. your reaction would be like "oh I died" *cums in danish*. and if you get this game you will probably get all the pussy cuz by now all the girls saw css in your libary and they are just wana blow you untill you dry. So buy it its worth it for sure. What do you think this is a scam?On a game where there are scamers? No fukin way what you tokin abut? why me change me accent to Dinosaur island language?*STARTS SCREAMING IN RUSSIAN* ебать тебя мир дерьмо иди ебать ты, блядь, мудак мать ебать пизду ебать тебя Родина иди купи игру.

This is my favourite game. Not only are the mechanics nearly perfect to my standards, but its SO much fun to play with friends. You're able to get custom skins and maps through gamebanana, and you can make the game really fun for yourself if you find it gets boring. Dont trap yourself and only play deathmatch. Try doing pugs, surf, surf deathmatch, bhopping, jailbreak, and more.

css, me gustaron los graficos, la jugabilidad, intermedio en todo entre 1.6 y go, mucho menos chitero y gente toxica como en el go. lastima que como no les sirve para lucrar no hay modos competitivos como el nuevo pero la comunidad sigue muy activa

O "Source" do nome indica o uso da mesma tecnologia que tornou "Half-Life 2" possível, mas isso não se traduz diretamente em uma qualidade gráfica idêntica entre os dois títulos. A razão disso é simples: manter o jogo acessível e rápido durante partidas na Internet. Não que as mudanças sejam pequenas: maior profundidade dos fundos, nível de detalhes e texturas melhoradas além de uma atmosfera sonora 3D impressionante. O efeito de cegar e ensurdecer do Flashbang, por exemplo, está quase igual ao de "Rainbow Six 3", adicionando maior realismo aos pequenos detalhes, uma coisa incrível.
